title: [OffTopic] AIML seniors, please suggest a laptop under 75k.
content: Which laptop do you use for AIML?

comments.body:
Loq is good, tbh anything works, get a good cpu with a decent gpu as gpu is rarely used mostly its you and your cpu.

You can check out msi as well, MacBook Air if you can get then thatâ€™s also nice
